channel.title: release on CloudNative PG
channel.description: Recent content in release on CloudNative PG

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.16.0 and 1.15.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.16 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.15 version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.15.1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.15.x version of the CloudNativePG operator.
